18#include <sys/cdefs.h>
19__RCSID("$NetBSD: xgetcwd.c,v 1.2 2016/05/17 14:00:09 christos Exp $");
20
21
22/* Written by Jim Meyering. */
23
24#ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
25# include <config.h>
26#endif
27
28#include "xgetcwd.h"
29
30#include <errno.h>
31
32#include "getcwd.h"
33#include "xalloc.h"
34
35/* Return the current directory, newly allocated.
36 Upon an out-of-memory error, call xalloc_die.
37 Upon any other type of error, return NULL. */
38
39char *
40xgetcwd (void)
41{
42 char *cwd = getcwd (NULL, 0);
43 if (! cwd && errno == ENOMEM)
44 xalloc_die ();
45 return cwd;
46}
47
